messages.content:
You are a chemist. Now you are given a reaction equation. Please predict the product of the reaction. The reaction equation has the following format:
```
reactant1.reactant2. ... .reactantN>>product
```
Your task is to predict the structure representation of the product molecule. We provide the SMILES of the reactants.
Predict the product of a chemical reaction with <molecule_2d>.<molecule_2d>.<molecule_2d>.<molecule_2d>.<molecule_2d>.<molecule_2d> as the reactants and reagents.
